dn21:1.3.3: jalatisu → jālatissu (bj) | jalatassu (s1-3, km) | jalitassu (pts1), jhāyatisu → jhāyatissu (bj) | jhāyatassu (s1-3, km) | pajjhāyitassu (pts1)
dn21:1.4.2: tadantaraṃ → tadanantara (bj) | tadanantaraṃ (s1-3, km, pts1, mr)
dn21:1.6.3: na ca pana → neva pana (s1-3, km)
dn21:1.11.6: itthittaṃ → itthicittaṃ (s1, pts1) | itthīcittaṃ (s2, s3, km), purisattaṃ → purisacittaṃ (s1-3, km, pts1)
dn21:1.12.16: Buddhassa dhammāni paṭiggahesuṃ → buddhassa dhammaṃ na paṭiggahesuṃ (s1-3, km, pts1)
dn21:1.12.37: byāyāma → viyāyamāma (bj, s1-3, km, pts1), viyāyāma → byāyamāma (bj) | vigāyāma (s1-3, km) | vitāyāma (pts1)
dn21:1.12.45: sannāni guṇāni → sandānaguṇāni (bj, pts1) | santāni guṇāni (s1-3, km)
dn21:2.1.1: devānamindo bhagavatā imaṃ bhagavantaṃ → devānamindo bhagavantaṃ imaṃ (pts1)
dn21:2.7.4: pana → yañca pana (s1-3, km) | yañca pana (pts1)
dn21:2.7.25: samupabyūḷho → samūpabyuḷho (s1) | samupabyuḷho (s2, s3, km) | samūpabbūḷho (pts1)
dn21:2.9.33: Tvameva asi → tvameva sivaṃ (s1-3, km) | tuvamevasi (pts1)
